articles.author: Gregory Krieg, CNN
articles.title: Bernie Sanders seeks support from allies in push to lead Biden's Labor Department
articles.description: Sen. Bernie Sanders is seeking the support of top labor leaders as he ramps up a campaign for the Labor secretary post in President-elect Joe Biden's administration.

articles.author: Aisha Salaudeen, CNN
articles.title: This $1 made-in-Africa Covid-19 test kit could revolutionize testing on the continent
articles.description: The Pasteur Institute in Senegal says it is close to producing an affordable, handheld Covid-19 diagnostic test kit that can give results in a matter of minutes.
articles.content:
(CNN)For the first time since the Covid-19 outbreak began, Africa may be poised to reshape rapid testing for the virus on the continent.

articles.title: GOP lawmaker on why he publicly acknowledged Biden's victory
articles.description: Rep. Denver Riggleman (R-VA) is one of the few Republican lawmakers that has publicly acknowledged President-elect Joe Biden's victory. Riggleman shares what he hears his colleagues saying behind closed doors and why fear hinders others from speaking out.

articles.title: 'It's delusional': Former national security adviser responds to Pompeo
articles.description: CNN's Wolf Blitzer talks to former national security adviser John Bolton about Secretary of State Mike Pompeo claiming there will be a "smooth transition to a second Trump adminstration" despite President-elect Joe Biden's victory.

articles.author: Harry Clarke-Ezzidio, CNN
articles.title: Archaeologists in Norway find rare Viking ship burial using only radar
articles.description: Norwegian archaeologists have identified a previously undiscovered "high-status" Viking burial site, featuring a feast hall, cult house, and the remnants of a ship burial.

articles.author: Rishi Iyengar, CNN Business
articles.title: Ring recalls 350,000 smart doorbells after some of them caught fire
articles.description: Amazon-subsidiary Ring is recalling hundreds of thousands of video doorbells after receiving reports of them catching fire.

articles.title: CNN 10 - November 11, 2020
articles.description: November 11, 2020

articles.author: CNN, CNN
articles.title: CNN10 - 11/10/20
articles.description: Weather and politics are two of our first topics today, followed by a test ride aboard a Hyperloop vehicle. Then, we're exploring pet adoption in the Covid era.

articles.title: Here are the world leaders who have congratulated Biden
articles.description: CNN's Brian Todd reports on reactions from leaders of US allies around the world to President-elect Joe Biden's victory in the 2020 election, from those who congratulated him to those who haven't.

articles.title: Dr. Sanjay Gupta answers questions on Covid-19 and vaccines
articles.description: CNN's Dr. Sanjay Gupta joins Anderson Cooper to answer viewer questions about Covid-19. Watch "Full Circle" every Monday, Tuesday and Friday at 6pm E.T.

articles.author: Elizabeth Cohen, CNN Senior Medical Correspondent
articles.title: A new test might be better at detecting past coronavirus infection, study finds
articles.description: The world has come to depend on antibody tests to check whether someone's already had Covid-19, but a study in the town where the virus first spread in Italy shows that these tests are not completely reliable.

articles.title: The PC guy from Apple's iconic commercials is back
articles.description: Apple's event announcing the M1 chip and new Macbooks had a surprise ending: the return of the PC guy. Actor John Hodgman played a PC opposite Justin Long's Mac in the tech company's iconic "Get a Mac" ads from the late 2000s.

articles.author: Lauren M. Johnson and Jeffrey Kopp, CNN
articles.title: A love for Disney and sheltering in place gave birth to a roller coaster in a California backyard
articles.description: Many people have adopted new hobbies to help cope with spending more time at home during the pandemic, but few have taken it to the level of a California family, who built a 400-foot roller coaster in their parents' backyard.

articles.author: Ganesh Setty, Sahar Akbarzai, and Eric Levenson, CNN
articles.title: NYPD will now allow religious people to wear head coverings in booking photos
articles.description: The New York Police Department will now allow religious people to wear head coverings during booking photos as part of a settlement with several Muslim women who said they were forced to remove their hijabs.

articles.title: Tommy Heinsohn, Boston Celtics legend, dies at 86
articles.description: Boston Celtics legend and basketball Hall of Famer Tommy Heinsohn has died, the team confirmed Tuesday. He was 86.

articles.author: Analysis by Chris Cillizza, CNN Editor-at-large
articles.title: 1 good thing Donald Trump did for politics
articles.description: Over the last four years, you would have been hard-pressed to find anyone who didn't feel strongly about President Donald Trump, love him or hate him.
articles.content:
THE POINT -- NOW ON YOUTUBE! 
In each episode of his weekly YouTube show, Chris Cillizza will delve a little deeper into the surreal world of politics. Click to subscribe!

articles.author: Jill Filipovic
articles.title: The GOP is pitifully out of step with America on Obamacare
articles.description: The Affordable Care Act may survive its challenge before the Supreme Court, writes Jill Filipovic, but there's no indication that the ACA is safe from continued Republican attacks, even as voters signal that they want the law to stand.

articles.title: People started coronavirus back-and-forth on mink farms, Dutch study shows
articles.description: People carried the coronavirus onto mink farms in the Netherlands, starting a viral back-and-forth that ended up with 68% of fur farm workers and their close associates infected, researchers reported Tuesday.
